ComicInfo.Summary:
The Resistance Part 1: The Volgan Republic of Asia attacks Britain, conquering it in The Eight Hour War. Bill Savage returns home to find his house destroyed, and his family killed.
Flesh Book 1 Part 1: Earl Reagan and The Rangers of the Trans-Time Corporation herd ten ton styracosaurs while fending off lurking tyrannosaurs.
Dan Dare Part 1: Dan Dare's space freighter Sirius is destroyed and he spots something "alien" in the red spot of Jupiter. Facing court martial for losing his ship, he escapes onto the Odyssey, which will be passing Jupiter before entering star drive.
Vulcan Part 1: John Probe becomes the first "man to be Activated by Compu-Puncture Hyperpower" and stops a group of terrorists who attacked R.A.F. Base Cottesdale.
Harlem Heroes Part 1: The Harlem Heroes win the first round of the Aeroball world championship only to have their hover-powered "road-liner" crash, killing nearly the entire team.

ComicInfo.Title: The Resistance Part 1; Flesh Book 1 Part 1; Dan Dare Part 1; Vulcan Part 1; Harlem Heroes Part 1
